data.text: Gong Zhenghua is a ground support officer of #CEAir. He volunteered to assist the charter flights of Wuhan medical team, escort medical staff and help Wuhan restart. https://t.co/6ZOj5m80Dj

6 flights per day! CEAir subsidiary OTT Airlines cargo charter flights set a new high. With the increasing demand for global material transportation, OTT Airlines is focusing on cargo charter flights of various countries to promote the resumption of work and production. https://t.co/oCYHssIDUO

These 2 young men are from CEAir. The left is Xing Zhipeng, an overhaul pro. He compiled a cartoon of daily inspection guidelines for big birds. The right is Sun Sheng, a check-in staff. He also helps guide passengers go to hotels, escort to board planes. https://t.co/YjHM3yllFs

Modern days, connecting with the world become a MUST condition. Disconnecting make people agitated.#CEAir is the first airline company in China to allow mobile phones and other electronic devices on board and more importantly also has China's largest fleet with WIFI. https://t.co/80YBMZheT5

data.text: In the classroom of Menglai Central School, CEAir pilot He Chao who came out of mountain gave a special lesson for children. He told with his own growth experience: "Even if the conditions are tough, only if you have ambitions and ideals, you can still create a sky of your own." https://t.co/ZSyuOQZEcK

“Take what Dad expects of you, fly your wings.” CEAir pilot Gao Pinghua has flown safely for 43 years, and the safe flight distance can be 443 circles around the earth. On his 60th birthday, after performing the last flight, he passed the baton to his daughter who also a pilot. https://t.co/7VMQ5W62e3

Presently, besides all cargo aircrafts, CEAir’s international freight capacity has 6“passenger to cargo” A330 aircrafts with increased cargo space, making CEAir become the largest modified wide-body fleet in China civil aviation. https://t.co/YEuFnDfLMZ
Photo credit: @AriesATC https://t.co/pjodB7UhfQ

On April 18, the temporary flight MU7092 performed by CEAir arrived in Hangzhou from the US, bringing 183 underage students back home. At present, CEAir has carried out 4 flights to take overseas students from London, San Francisco, New York and other places back to China. https://t.co/o3PIyetNBS

On April 17, CEAir transported 18 tons of medical supplies from Beijing to Moscow. Since this Flight MU7029 is CEAir's first time to operate Beijing-Moscow route, 6 highly skilled CEAir pilots were selected to perform this long distance and long-time mission. https://t.co/5O5AZRJ0pc
Long live China-Sri Lanka Friendship!🇨🇳🇱🇰 https://t.co/A1nmqJXEoZ

This is what we should do, CEAir is honored to be a part of this transportation mission. We humans will eventually win this battle. @ChinaEmbSL https://t.co/FcUkRQH33R

On April 13, CEAir escorted medical staff from Chengdu to Hangzhou carrying hematopoietic stem cells. After more than two hours of flight, the flight arrived half an hour earlier than originally planned, and delivered it to patients in urgent need of surgery. https://t.co/Wm1aKMeKdO

He is an emergency doctor. Because of the serious disease, he postponed his wedding and went to support Wuhan resolutely.  On April 10, CEAir flight attendant Zhang Xinyu personally made a paper-cut painting as a gift to the " groom to be" Happy wedding! https://t.co/Z5iFJguyum

data.text: "Actually, we rarely fly together before, but we have a tacit understanding that as long as we wear uniforms and get on the plane, we are not only couples, but also partners fighting the disease” A CEAir couple stuck to their posts to guard the health of passengers. https://t.co/3ut3hMmrK3

April 13, #CEAir flight was filled with medical supplies, export goods and mail to Osaka, Japan. CEAir has modified the cargo net bag and made anti-touch safety tips to ensure flight safety. This is Jiangxi's first batch of "China Post" international air cargo mail charter. https://t.co/xxv8nLF1Q3

On April 9, #CEAir flew from Ningbo to Frankfurt, Germany, carrying over 100 tons of medical supplies, mechanical parts and electronic products, which starts the official all-cargo aircraft transportation between the two cities. https://t.co/Ov6BCiS8S8

On April 12, #CEAir took 180 underage students from San Francisco to return home. Earlier, CEAir sent flight to take back students from the UK, and this is the first time China Civil Aviation has carried out a charter flight for returning overseas students since the outbreak. https://t.co/0F2CoRSrGy
The safety and health of our passengers are always the top priority of CEAir. We are very proud of bringing these students back home!✈️ https://t.co/kB4UZlEs2p https://t.co/b6hiGzRe2P

We are very honored and happy having been delivering the supplies to our neighboring country Sri Lanka. Long live the friendship of Sri Lanka and China. We will win this fighting.🇨🇳🇱🇰 https://t.co/PMYU4ndg4n https://t.co/wFEtBEUEVJ

data.text: "This is my hometown, this is what I should do." Wang Cuo is a flight attendant of #CEAir. She grew up in Aba, Sichuan. After seeing the lack of local supplies, she bought some protective equipment at her own expense to solve the urgent needs of her hometown. https://t.co/9ytaNyisRP

#CEAir, one of the nation’s top three leading airlines, outperformed all the other domestic carriers in terms of flight punctuality on March, 2020, meanwhile topping NO.3 at international chart. CEAir is dedicated to bringing you to destinations safely and punctually. https://t.co/l2capmZQc6

“You just can't drive randomly, even there is no traffic light.”Yang Yanqing said. He is a driver inside the airport landing field. He kept a zero accident record for 6 years. As he believes, when you touch steering wheel, the safety of aircraft and colleagues are in your hands. https://t.co/muQgdmVw77

On April 8, Wuhan Tianhe Airport's first outbound flight MU2527 took off, carrying 49 passengers to Sanya. #CEAir MU2527 became the "first flight" to resume domestic passenger flights at the airport. https://t.co/wyWcwo3VPM

data.text: April 6, Shanghai Airlines charter flight, a branch of #CEAir, carrying Chinese medical aid to the EU arrived at Rome, Italy. This batch of supplies includes 50,000 sets of test kits. The EU Emergency Response Coordination Center distributed these supplies directly to Italy. https://t.co/ASCQ2Eudlh

April 6, #CEAir 3 charter flights took back 593 medical staff from Wuhan, the epicenter of the disease, to their hometowns Shanghai and Shaanxi. A painting and a cake from CEAir staff as gifts were given to these heroes to commemorate their unconditional dedication and fighting. https://t.co/erFxPVIK64

#CEAir always puts the highest priority on passenger safety through comprehensive measures to escort flights and passengers including holding pre-flight preparation meeting, conducting temperature checks on passengers, performing zone management in the air, etc. https://t.co/8OiSJ60gbC

"I will pick you up the day you come back." Chen Xiang's said to his fiancee. She came to Hubei as a medical team member on February 9th. Now that she has returned safely. In the cabin, they finally gave each other a close hug in 50 days. https://t.co/VzfSQpuitz
China Eastern is standing with you.💪🇨🇳🇫🇷 https://t.co/QkonKehhz9

#CEAir came up with these "homestead plans" for you.☺️
#StayAtHome https://t.co/DFJ2OnSAUm

On Apr. 2, #CEAir sends #Boeing B777-300er to London to take about 180 overseas students back to #China.
The aircraft enjoys the largest passenger capacity and load capacity among the fleet as well as the most experienced crew, just to ensure the health and safety of citizens. https://t.co/TiS002BHnx

data.text: On March 24, 172 medical staff arrived in Lanzhou by charter flight of #CEAir. In the welcome crowd, the young man Li Xiang holding flowers yelled the name of the nurse, Sun Yanni, to propose to her, and she agreed, which touched the crowd on the spot. https://t.co/A0zYKhz5xM

🥰A protective suit, signed by 172 medical staff and witnessed the friendship between civil aviation people and angels in white, was given to #CEAir. 
From Mar 17 to 24, just a whole week, CEAir has performed 43 charter flights and escorted nearly 6,000 medical staff back home. https://t.co/Ofh4OsmT6f

On March 25, China's third batch of medical expert groups, a total of 14 people‍👩‍⚕️🧑‍⚕️ set off to Milan Malpensa on the #CEAir flight to assist #Italy🇮🇹 with medical supplies, including 30 ventilators, 20  monitors, 3000 protective clothing, etc. https://t.co/haMLiC6DM7

"Heroes heading against the wind, we will take you home when you return! " #CEAir once promised. 
Now, promises are being fulfilled step by step. Today, #CEAir carried another 200 medical staff and slowly landed🛬 at #Shanghai Hongqiao International Airport. https://t.co/M7cKSTLR3W

On Mar 23, #CEAir took the heroes home safe and sound once more, carrying a total of 432 👩‍⚕️🧑‍⚕️ back to #Shanxi, China. Three charters were invested in this mission at the same time, which is the largest single-day investment in Wuhan charter missions. https://t.co/96v1DjAfD9

data.text: On March 23, three #CEAir flights en route to Europe took off from Lanzhou, China with 3085 kilograms of medical protective supplies. All supplies will be then sent to #Spain 🇪🇸, #Romania 🇷🇴, #France 🇫🇷 and other places  to help the local prevent and control the disease. https://t.co/jzGVac3GPD
We are in this together. 🇨🇳 🇮🇹 #FightTogether #ForzaCinaeItalia https://t.co/v3usyIWpPP

March 22, #CEAir once again dispatched 5 charter flights to Wuhan to pick up 912 medical team members and return them to their hometowns. As of 22, CEAir has performed 34 medical teams return charters, transporting a total of 4,409 👩‍⚕️👨‍⚕️. https://t.co/NQbo2O3mAs
https://t.co/wXmU1XOiEW

💪Self Protection is responsible for yourself and people around. But do you really remember those huge amount of online ℹ️info. ?
#CEAir made daily self protection tips. Save and share them if you find them useful. 💕#StayAtHome #SafeHands 💕 https://t.co/dQOonRJrF1
💕 https://t.co/5BNvjRjHRl

data.text: On March 19, #CEAir sent 6 more planes to #Wuhan to transport 845 medical team members back to their hometown. So far, CEAir has received a total of 2,428 medical team members. Salute the heroes and welcome home!💐 https://t.co/pWuoiSFur5

A kindness received should be returned with a freer hand. On the Mar. 18 local time, #CEAir flight once again leapfrogged 8 countries, spanned thousands of miles, brought China's second batch of medical experts and supplies to #Milan. https://t.co/8ijuIqYvBP

On Mar. 18, medical supplies provided by China🇨🇳 to France🇫🇷 arrive at Paris with the assistance of #CEAir. France provided valuable support and assistance to China. In this critical time, China is willing to provide France with due help. Unis nous vaincrons. https://t.co/z75DaonnLW

data.text: Since mid-February, CEAir has launched a "custom charter" business, and has accepted charter flights applications from companies for resumption of work and production. On March 14, China Eastern Airlines carried 148 employees returned to Urumqi to resume work. https://t.co/3aCSzdc6MF

CEAir 's second anti-epidemic aid charter flight to Italy with 13 medical experts and 17.3 tons of supplies has taken off. Supplies include ICU equipment, laboratory testing reagents, protective materials, etc. The flight will arrive in Milan in 12 hours. https://t.co/BF61rtCkLG

China Eastern's aircraft carrying medical aid from China to help Spain combat #COVID19 arrives at Zaragoza airport in northern Spain. 
(📷: Chinese Embassy in Spain) https://t.co/KztSqGJacc

data.text: On March 17, China Civil Aviation sent 21 charter planes to pick up more than 3,000 doctors and nurses from Wuhan and returned them to their hometown. Under their careful treatment, the number of confirmed cases has been cleared in 14 provinces in China. https://t.co/MerVXhasPv

China and Italy are a family! On March 12, a team of Chinese expert group with medical supplies arrived in Rome. CEAir Italian captain Mauro Benvenuto is grateful for China's assistance. He believes that as long as China and Italy work together, we will overcome the pandemic. https://t.co/8bo97TCdrA

#CEAir Wuhan Company has set up a life support base for medical teams of over 300 people, providing them with high-quality service guarantees to fight the COVID-19, so that they can keep working vigorously.💕 https://t.co/VV6eyY9CXq
